title: APPLY_WEATHER_CYCLES
content:
0x3422291C// ApplyWeatherCycles
BOOL APPLY_WEATHER_CYCLES(int numEntries, int msPerCycle);Parameters:numEntries: The number of cycle entries. Must be between 1 and 256msPerCycle: The duration in milliseconds of each cycle. Must be between 1000 and 86400000 (24 hours)Returns: Returns true if all parameters were valid, otherwise false.Examples:Lua-- Cycle between XMAS weather for 30 seconds (3 * 10000 milliseconds), and SMOG weather for 20 seconds (2 * 10000 milliseconds)
local success = SetWeatherCycleEntry(0, "XMAS", 3) and
                SetWeatherCycleEntry(1, "SMOG", 2) and
                ApplyWeatherCycles(2, 10000)
codeBlocks:
// ApplyWeatherCycles
BOOL APPLY_WEATHER_CYCLES(int numEntries, int msPerCycle);

-- Cycle between XMAS weather for 30 seconds (3 * 10000 milliseconds), and SMOG weather for 20 seconds (2 * 10000 milliseconds)
local success = SetWeatherCycleEntry(0, "XMAS", 3) and
                SetWeatherCycleEntry(1, "SMOG", 2) and
                ApplyWeatherCycles(2, 10000)
